tool_description: Currency data on free markets, gold data on free markets, completely free Finance API for developers
title: Truncgil Finance

api_list.name: Version1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://truncgil-finance.p.rapidapi.com/today.json"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "truncgil-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
